responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain data pipelines, dashboards, and reporting systems to provide actionable insights on recruiting metrics and trends.
Collaborate with recruiting leadership to identify key performance indicators and create data visualizations that inform recruiting strategies.
Implement and optimize applicant tracking system (ATS) integrations and other recruiting tools to ensure data accuracy and consistency.
Conduct in-depth analyses of recruiting data to identify patterns, bottlenecks, and opportunities for improvement in hiring processes.
Develop predictive models and machine learning algorithms to enhance candidate sourcing, screening, and matching processes.
Create and maintain documentation for data processes, metrics definitions, and analytics methodologies.
Partner with engineering teams to ensure data privacy and security best practices are followed in all recruiting analytics initiatives.
Continuously research and implement new technologies and methodologies to improve recruiting analytics capabilities.
qualifications: Proficiency in SQL, Python, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Looker, or Power BI).
Experience working with applicant tracking systems (ATS) and HR information systems (HRIS).
Deep understanding of recruiting metrics, funnel analysis, and talent acquisition processes.
Ability to translate complex data into clear, actionable insights for both technical and non-technical audiences.
Passion for using data to drive decision-making and process improvements.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Excellent communication skills and ability to build strong relationships across teams.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on designing, developing, and maintaining data pipelines, dashboards, and reporting systems for recruiting metrics. It involves collaborating with recruiting leadership, implementing and optimizing applicant tracking systems, conducting in-depth analyses of recruiting data, and developing predictive models and machine learning algorithms to enhance candidate sourcing, screening, and matching processes. The skills required include proficiency in SQL, Python, and data visualization tools, experience with applicant tracking systems, and a deep understanding of recruiting metrics and talent acquisition processes.

The job description emphasizes data analytics, predictive modeling, and machine learning algorithms, but there is no specific mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs). The focus is on recruiting analytics and improving hiring processes through data-driven insights and machine learning, rather than on developing or working with GenAI or LLMs.

Therefore, based on the responsibilities and skills listed, this job does not involve working with Generative AI or language models.
